title: Geography (Japan): Demographics (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Demographics subcategory within Geography (Japan). Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Out of the Japanese population of 128 million people, 13 million, which is almost one-tenth, reside in Tokyo.
cards.romaji: Nihon no zen jink ichi-oku ni-sen happyaku-man-nin no uchi, j.-bun no ichi ni ataru sen san-byaku-man-nin ga T ky ni sunde imasu.
cards.japanese: 日本の全人口一億二千八百万人のうち、十分の一に当たる千三百万人 が東京に住んでいます。
